term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - Lorentzian band shape
term.title: Lorentzian band shape

item.text: This band shape is described by the function: F(ν - ν0) = 1/π.γ((ν - ν0)^2 + ɣ^2)-1 is the mean band position, γ is the half band width at half maximum, and F(ν - ν0) is the frequency distribution function.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2223. 'Glossary of terms used in photochemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2252 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122223)
